SEARCH
Package ca.jolt.http

Interface BodyPublisherFunction

Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface BodyPublisherFunction
Functional interface that represents a function for modifying an HttpRequest.Builder with a given HttpRequest.BodyPublisher.

Implementations of this interface should define how the provided bodyPublisher is applied to the builder.

Example usage: 


 BodyPublisherFunction publisherFunction = (builder, body) -> builder.POST(body);
 HttpRequest.Builder requestBuilder = HttpRequest.newBuilder(URI.create("https://example.com"));
 HttpRequest request = publisherFunction.apply(requestBuilder, HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.ofString("data")).build();
Since:
1.0
Author:
William Beaudin

    apply(HttpRequest.Builder builder, HttpRequest.BodyPublisher bodyPublisher)

  • Method Details

    • apply

      HttpRequest.Builder apply(HttpRequest.Builder builder, HttpRequest.BodyPublisher bodyPublisher)
      Applies the given HttpRequest.BodyPublisher to the provided HttpRequest.Builder.
      Parameters:
      builder - the HttpRequest.Builder to modify
      bodyPublisher - the BodyPublisher containing the request body
      Returns:
      the modified HttpRequest.Builder
